original_text: They give drink to every beast of the field: the wild asses quench their thirst.
korean_text: 각종 들짐승에게 마시게 하시니 들나귀들도 해갈하며

sentences.original_text: They give drink to every beast of the field:
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 들에 있는 모든 짐승에게 마시움을 주고:

sentences.original_text: the wild asses quench their thirst.
